title: Machete Makes Tacos: Actor Danny Trejo on Prison, Hollywood and Carnitas
itunes:title: Machete Makes Tacos: Actor Danny Trejo on Prison, Hollywood and Carnitas
itunes:subtitle: This week, Hollywood star and restaurateur Danny Trejo shares his culinary inspirations and tips for amazing tacos.
description:
This week, Hollywood star and restaurateur Danny Trejo shares his culinary inspirations and tips for amazing tacos. Plus, Gena Renaud of Yume Confections teaches us about the art of wagashi, Alex Aïnouz dives into the world of meatballs, and we roast a chicken the Nigella Lawson way. (Originally aired July 10, 2020.)


Get this week's recipe, Coriander-Roasted Chicken: https://www.177milkstreet.com/recipes/coriander-roasted-chicken


We want to hear your culinary tips! Share your cooking hacks, secret ingredients or unexpected techniques with us for a chance to hear yourself on Milk Street Radio! Here's how: https://www.177milkstreet.com/radiotips


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
